item.title: Professional Portfolio Launch - Showcasing 100+ Projects
item.description: Launching my professional web development portfolio featuring 100+ completed projects across 30+ countries. Specializing in responsive design, WordPress development, React.js applications, and full-stack solutions.

item.title: Featured Projects Gallery - WordPress & React.js Showcase
item.description: Explore my comprehensive project gallery featuring responsive websites, WordPress solutions, React.js applications, and e-commerce platforms. Each project demonstrates modern web development practices and user-centered design.

item.title: Professional Web Development Services Available
item.description: Offering comprehensive web development services including responsive design, full-stack development, WordPress customization, and performance optimization. 3+ years of experience with proven results.
